name: Frozen Banana Daiquiri
description: Here’s something to do with those rapidly ripening bananas on the kitchen counter. Simple syrup can be made ahead of time and kept in your fridge, and the basic ratio is one part sugar to one part water (you can do two parts sugar for a richer syrup). Bring water to a boil, add the sugar, and cook until completely dissolved. It’s an easy base for a world of cocktails. (The New York Times)
keywords: banana, dark rum, light rum, summer
recipeIngredient:
2 large, very ripe,
frozen bananas, sliced

recipeInstructions.text:
Blend ingredients until smooth and
frosty.

Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish
with umbrella, cherry and orange slice.
